com.example.booksies.controller

Class AutofillBookDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
      • com.example.booksies.controller.AutofillBookDescription

  • public class AutofillBookDescription
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
    AutofillBookDescription handles the api that retrieves author, title, comments of a book through a google api by using ISBN code. It is called from AddBookFragment while adding a new book.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask
